title: chem lab
content: for chem lab exam we have to learn the procedure, and graph plotting of all 10 expts? how will it be conducted?

comments.body: And also will they help us in between or is it very strict ?
Okay.. i thought its like 12th grade practical exams...copy when teacher is goneðŸ˜‚

Exams here aren't to be taken lightly, they're pretty straight about procedures and not abiding them. I'm sure you're already aware of the consequences of not having enough attendance for a course as well as what happens if you're caught cheating during the exams.
Learn a general overview. If you're lab teacher is lenient they may forgive you not knowing something but if they're strict you may need to pay attention.
